settings.desc__cont:
Tru Bloom Natural Hair Growth Serum is formulated with Clinically Tested, Scientifically Proven ingredients like Peppermint Oil, Green Tea, Bhringraj, Caffeine, Sea Kelp & more, to seriously nourish your hair follicles and stimulate your scalp - fueling faster & fuller hair growth

  • Encourage blood flow to the scalp
  • Nourish and strengthen hair follicles
  • Stimulating both new hair growth & regrowth
settings.dire__cont: How to use it: For best results, we recommend that you apply the Tru Bloom Hair Growth Serum to your scalp daily. Fill the dropper and apply it all over the scalp, and gently massage the product in. Apply to either dry or towel dried hair. (Do not rinse out)
settings.ingr__cont: Aqua (Purified Water), Alcohol Denat., Ethoxydiglycol, Propanediol, Apple Cider Vinegar, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Water), Peppermint Oil, Butylene Glycol, Water, Dextran, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Vegetable Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Kakadu Plum Extract, Green Tea Extract, Hibiscus Flower Extract, Amla Fruit Extract, Bhringraj Extract, Horsetail Extract, Lindera Strychnifolia Root Extract, Red Ginseng Extract, Aloe Leaf Juice, Saw Palmetto Extract, Red Algae Extract, Maltodextrin, Biotin (Vitamin B7), Panthenol (Vitamin B5), MSM (Methyl Sulfonyl Methane), Caffeine, Vitamin E, Xylityl Glucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Pentylene Glycol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Xanthan Gum, Certified Natural (CN) Fragrance, GeogardÂ® Ultra.
